com.digi.xbee.api

Class RemoteDigiPointDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.AbstractXBeeDevice
      • com.digi.xbee.api.RemoteXBeeDevice
        • com.digi.xbee.api.RemoteDigiPointDevice

  • public class RemoteDigiPointDevice
extends RemoteXBeeDevice
    This class represents a remote DigiPoint device.
    See Also:
    RemoteXBeeDevice, RemoteDigiMeshDevice, RemoteRaw802Device, RemoteZigBeeDevice

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteDigiPointDevice

        public RemoteDigiPointDevice(DigiPointDevice localXBeeDevice,
                     XBee64BitAddress addr64)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteDigiPointDevice object with the given local DigiPointDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local point-to-multipoint device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote point-to-multipoint device.
        addr64 - The 64-bit address to identify this remote point-to-multipoint device.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr64 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee64BitAddress

      • RemoteDigiPointDevice

        public RemoteDigiPointDevice(XBeeDevice localXBeeDevice,
                     XBee64BitAddress addr64)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteDigiPointDevice object with the given local XBeeDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local XBee device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote point-to-multipoint device.
        addr64 - The 64-bit address to identify this remote point-to-multipoint device.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true or if localXBeeDevice.getXBeeProtocol() != XBeeProtocol.DIGI_POINT.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr64 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee64BitAddress

      • RemoteDigiPointDevice

        public RemoteDigiPointDevice(XBeeDevice localXBeeDevice,
                     XBee64BitAddress addr64,
                     String id)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteDigiPointDevice object with the given local XBeeDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local XBee device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote point-to-multipoint device.
        addr64 - The 64-bit address to identify this remote point-to-multipoint device.
        id - The node identifier of this remote point-to-multipoint device. It might be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true or if localXBeeDevice.getXBeeProtocol() != XBeeProtocol.DIGI_POINT.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr64 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee64BitAddress

    • Method Detail

      • getXBeeProtocol

        public XBeeProtocol getXBeeProtocol()
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns the XBee Protocol of this XBee device.

        To refresh this value use the AbstractXBeeDevice.readDeviceInfo() method.

        Overrides:
        getXBeeProtocol in class AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns:
        The XBee device protocol.
        See Also:
        XBeeProtocol
